description: Make the most of summer produce with this healthier salad recipe. With salmon and an Asian-inspired dressing, this vibrant salad is perfect for summer feasting.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Easy Summer Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 Qukes baby cucumbers, peeled into ribbons

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium high heat. Add salmon and cook for 8 minutes, turning once, or until medium rare (or cooked to your liking). Remove from pan and set aside to rest for 5 minutes. Roughly flake.
To make the dressing, place all the dressing ingredients in a screwtop jar and shake to combine.
Divide carrot, cabbage, baby cucumber and radish among plates. Top with edamame, onion and salmon, then drizzle with dressing. Serve scattered with chia seeds and shallots.
